TASK: Edit timer duration
DOMAIN: clock

STEPS:
1. Open the Start menu to access applications
   REASONING: Need to access the Windows Clock application to edit a timer
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.02, y=0.98)

2. Wait for Start menu to open
   REASONING: Allow time for the Start menu animation and rendering to complete
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

3. Type "Clock" to search for the Clock application
   REASONING: Quickly locate the Windows Clock application through search
   ACTION: TYPE("Clock")

4. Wait for search results to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the search to process and display results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on the Clock application in search results
   REASONING: Launch the Windows Clock application
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.3)

6. Wait for Clock application to open
   REASONING: Allow time for the application to fully load and display its interface
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Click on the Timer tab
   REASONING: Navigate to the Timer section where existing timers can be edited
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.3, y=0.08)

8. Wait for Timer section to load
   REASONING: Ensure the timer interface is fully rendered before interacting
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

9. Click on an existing timer to select it for editing
   REASONING: Select the timer that needs duration modification
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.35)

10. Click the Edit button (pencil icon) for the selected timer
    REASONING: Enter edit mode to modify the timer's duration settings
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.85, y=0.35)

11. Wait for edit interface to appear
    REASONING: Allow the timer edit controls to display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

12. Click on the minutes field to modify duration
    REASONING: Focus on the time input field to change the timer duration
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.4)

13. Clear existing time value and enter new duration
    REASONING: Replace the current timer duration with the desired new value
    ACTION: HOTKEY("ctrl", "a")

14. Type the new timer duration
    REASONING: Input the updated minutes value for the timer
    ACTION: TYPE("15")

15. Click the Save button to confirm changes
    REASONING: Apply and save the edited timer duration
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.6, y=0.65)

16. Wait for changes to be saved
    REASONING: Ensure the updated timer duration is committed to the application
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

17. Task completion
    REASONING: Timer duration has been successfully edited and saved
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The timer duration should be successfully modified to the new value (15 minutes in this example). The updated timer will be displayed in the Timer section of the Clock application with the new duration, ready to be started when needed.
